class.name: BTSetAgentProperty
class.brief_description: BT action that assigns a value to agent's property.
class.description: BTSetAgentProperty assigns the specified [member value] to the agent's property identified by the [member property_name] and returns [code]SUCCESS[/code]. Returns [code]FAILURE[/code] if it fails to set the property.

members.member: Parameter that specifies the agent's property name.
Parameter that specifies the value that will be assigned to agent's property.
